timeline.bodyText:
I would code this as follows:
diagnosticReport.addCategory().setSystem(FhirConstants.DIAGNOSTIC_SERVICE_SECTIONS_VALUESET_URI).setCode(FhirConstants.DIAGNOSTIC_REPORT_CATEGORY_LAB);
